name: Snow Day Potato Soup

ingredients.name: lb. bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled

instructions: Chop potatoes (skin on) into 1-inch chunks and just barely cov- er with water, cook until almost tender. Saute onions and celery in stick of butter, add to potatoes and water. Mix flour and milk, add to potato mixture. Let simmer for 1?2 hour to thicken and add salt and pepper. Serve in bowls or crocks, topped with 1 tablespoon sour cream, grated cheese, green onion and crumbled bacon. Great served with warm, crusty bread and butter.
